name: Ball Duel Epic 2
description:
Ball Duel Epic 2 is a brand new and amazing puzzle game! you must survive in five secret scenes to get the legendary treasure! Win all the levels, and try to get three stars! Your target is to eliminate all the Marbles before the moves out and make more Combos and Chains to get the highest score. It has a lot of new items to make the game much more interesting and challenging.
How to play :
1. Touch the screen where you want to shoot.
2. Match 3 or more same ball to eliminate them
